channel.title: bb's bbbq byobb
channel.description: coder/activist/gothy ex-art student/second tallest possum in the earth's mantle

item.title: Activism is mostly doing peoples jobs for them
item.description: An inexperienced Dr. House deals with the guilt of having lost his first patient, a 67 year old prosecutor from Brooklyn. Questions surround whether the quality of his care contributed to his fate. Elsewhere, it's ice cream day in the cafeteria and Wilson is lactose intolerant for a day!

item.title: The Joy of Cultural Collapse
item.description: In which our protagonist grapples with the meaning of Inception while sitting in a bath tub full of champagne with River Pheonix (deceased)
